main event: Multiple witnesses observed a bright object hovering and moving with unusual characteristics over Newburgh, New York, on various occasions in October 1956.
interesting points: One sighting recorded a bright light about the size of a car that hovered and then shot up at incredible speed,The object changed color from white to red during one sighting,The reports suggested that a considerable number of similar sightings occurred in the area around the same time,Weather balloons were hypothesized as potential explanations for the sightings,Several witnesses confirmed the sightings, noting that the objects did not resemble conventional aircraft.
sighted object: One bright circular object with a red light, possibly a balloon
witness description: Civilians including a male civil defense official
